descriptionHtml:
Yeorman the exiled Greybeard waits at the Vilemyr Inn of Ivarstead.
He casts frostbite and stoneflesh, and can use unrelenting force and disarm shouts.
He is just hired for 500 gold at the moment but in the future there will be a quest and you will also need to have returned the Horn of Jurgen Windcaller to the Greybeards.

v2: Can dismiss, give orders and starts with a steel dagger.  Cannot open his inventory (intentional).  He no longer has any spells and only uses shouts.
His shouts include unrelenting force, disarm (will not disarm the player), ice form and create decoy (lasts 10min but can only cast once a day).
v1: Can\'t dismiss him (yet).

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3381541][img]http://i.imgur.com/jqeEV.jpg[/img][/url]
author: mrjentipede
